item.description:
Anybody who loves playing cards this would be an event for you. My wife and I Steve & Melissa Rosen are hosting a Texas Holdem Tournament on Saturday June 5th at 7 P.M. at our home in Hingham.

Unfortunately our space is limited so we can only accept the first 8 signups. However if we do get overwhelming response we will look to find a bigger space to plan future Texas Holdem events.

Its going to be a good time and can't wait to see everybody there! Once I get the list I will reach out to you to get your personal email address to get you directions.
item.name: Texas Holdem Tournament
